home.title: Glooko Insights
home.subtitle: A web app for importing, visualizing, and analyzing diabetes data exported from the Glooko platform
home.dataUploadDescription: Upload and manage your Glooko export files with drag-and-drop support
home.comprehensiveReportsDescription: View detailed analytics including time-in-range, patterns, and trends
home.aiAnalysisDescription: Get intelligent insights and recommendations using advanced AI algorithms
home.settingsDescription: Your data is stored locally with configurable persistence options
